attributes.action: Let prisoners go home to their families with an electronic tag during covid-19
attributes.additional_details: I want prisoners with less serious offences to be protected with their families at a time like this with an electronic tag!! Please sign sign sign every signature will be a step towards helping a lot of families like myself
attributes.background: I’m a single mother with 3 children my husband is in prison on a less serious offence and is due to be out in September due to covid-19 I think he should be allowed home on an electronic case at a time like this and I’m sure a lot of other single mothers with small children will agree!!!!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305604

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
